slideshow.description: Four-year-old Casper was rescued from a breeder when he was 2, and his owner takes great care in giving him a good life.
slideshow.reason: This dog is coming in for a nail trim and grooming

slideshow.description: Chip is a vivacious 5-year-old African Cichlid with a bit of a temper towards other fish.
slideshow.reason: This fish has a spotty white patch developing on his back

slideshow.description: Nugget’s got his name because his owner’s daughter though he looked like a golden nugget when he was a baby.
slideshow.reason: This little nugget has  a rash on his stomach area

adoption.description: Six-month-old Pepe is very active and is always keeping his owners, and us, on our toes!
adoption.reason: It's time for this rabbit's post spaying surgery checkup

adoption.description: Nadalee is a 7-year-old long hair Chihuahua with a very pleasant, laid back, temperament.
adoption.reason: This dog is coming in for his monthly nail trim and grooming

adoption.description: This iguana is on the endangered species list, and is thriving well in her owner’s home.
adoption.reason: This iguana's is showing signs of dementia associated with his old age

adoption.description: Oddball was the runt of his litter and has some breathing problems but is thriving well.
adoption.reason: Oddball has a hard lump on right front foot

adoption.description: Chyna got her name because she’s a gentle 13-year-old turtle with a tough shell.
adoption.reason: This turtle is coming in for a checkup and to be tested for Salmonella

adoption.description: At 8 years old there isn’t anything Wesley can’t do, he’s very healthy and full of energy!
adoption.reason: This dog is returning for his next heartworm treatment visit

appointments.description: Sami is a very happy go lucky 1-year-old Dalmatian that loves to play.
appointments.reason: Sami has had some changes in his bathroom in habits

appointments.description: Cosmo is possibly the happiest parrot that lived, and loves to sing Happy Birthday to anyone that will listen.
appointments.reason: Cosmo's mom would like us to check for arthritic conditions and do a routine checkup

appointments.description: Tibbs suffers from a spinal condition that can cause immobilization and his owner has to watch his activity levels.
appointments.reason: Tibbs has had an ongoing rash and cold symptoms and we are going to run allergy tests

appointments.description: Four-year-old Stich was born with a birth defect that required surgery at 6 weeks of age.
appointments.reason: Stich has been having some stomach issues and is due for his vaccinations
